name: Robot Racer
description:
This is a game where you give a robot a purpose by training it to race! You have to collaborate with the robot in 3 mini games that will help train your robot! (Go In full screen mode for best experience!)

This game was made for the Wowie game jam! This was my first game jam ever and I had a lot of fun even though I missed the first day! I may not have gotten all of the time I needed to do good in all of the judging factors but it was enough to submit something and I am just happy I did get something to submit!
